post.body: - congrats! That's a big accomplishment! :-)
- I think @cuddlemonkey is part raccoon because he is so omnivorous. Or maybe part goat.
- uh oh. pleasant dreams!
- no idea what you're talking about
- a tsukahara! Wow! I remember girls on our team doing that in high school!!!
- I'm sure you do know, but I would never use it in my regular speaking! :-)
- good job on the waffles, guys!!
- nope, they have not!
- we saw prince caspian this week too!
- why do u have font envy?
- thanks so much for taking our kids!!!!!
- haha!
oops, it's cuz i don't have crimp pliers... ok put project aside til pliers come in....
is baffled why her bead crimps look so ugly...time to research the internet
had a nice potluck dinner with small group
is so amazed at the goodness of God and how he blesses us beyond what I deserve!
finished another pair of pretty earrings!
is making jewelry and watching a video on how to make chai lattes... looks really easy! but looks can be deceiving
is done with working/obligatory duties and can now relax on day off! (for half an hour before next commitment)
is back to grading homework
was reflecting with hubby that home seems inhabited by vultures that swoop in and devour everything in sight... otherwise known as teenagers
just had the shortest session doing bills ever... or sure feels like itwas!
has finished working and is now working on home stuff
has taken 2 hours to eat bits and pieces of her lunch
had a restless sleep and is dragging this morning
is editing what was supposed to be a short video job for church tomorrow...always end up with technical complications :-)
is amazed at how much noise, activity, and yakking there is here at 1:27 am... kids have friend staying over
is bummed she cannot find her flute anywhere
is happily listening to her kids and a friend create the pirates of the caribbean theme on clarinet and violin
had a houseful of teenage guys playing video battles and teenage girls playing music
is feeling sleepy, very sleepy.....
helped a friend organize her jewelry this afternoon
just received a fedex package delivered by a ups truck. weird.
is enjoying a nice, warm cup of hot chocolate...mmmm.....
is mocking up more church website pages... for fun
has had sleeping problems during vacation... that's just wrong! :-(
is working on the church website
whizzed through bills and beginning of year budgeting. Yay!
has successfully reorganized the garage with hubby!
has been so busy hasn't had time to check twitter! cooked lunch, packed up food to freeze, dishes, cleaned kitchen, gonna organize garage
